category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEMFGDisplayName
preference.preference_description: Defines the customized display name in the tree structure for weld points, arc welds, and datum points. Valid Values: Accepts the five following Teamcenter properties. bl_item_item_id bl_item_object_name bl_rev_item_revision_id bl_rev_object_name bl_occurrence_name You can use multiple properties, for example: bl_item_item_id bl_item_object_name The weld point display name is then 000171;WP1
